safari.heroDescription: Experience the perfect balance of comfort and adventure. Set on a spacious 3×6 m platform, this 12 m² canvas tent has protective side and back walls—giving you privacy and shelter while staying close to nature.

sections.heading: Space & Layout
sections.description: The tent features a well-planned, cozy interior with thoughtful touches for easy living.
features: Side & back wall for privacy and shelter
Mosquito mesh on all windows & doors

sections.heading: Sleep & Comfort
sections.description: Two single beds with pedestals and shaded lamps can be combined into a King-size bed for guests who prefer a double configuration.
features: Powerful fan for cool summer nights
Small shelving unit for clothes & essentials

sections.heading: Terrace & Garden
sections.description: Step onto your private terrace, furnished with rolled palm-leaf chairs. Enjoy views of the lush tropical garden—beautifully illuminated at night for a romantic ambiance.

sections.heading: Bathrooms
sections.description: Guests have access to shared bathrooms, separate for ladies and gents—kept clean and convenient.

sections.heading: Good to Know
sections.description: During public-holiday weekends and peak season (late December–early January), the village can be lively. Complimentary earplugs are available at reception to ensure a restful night's sleep.
sections.closingNote: A spacious, nature-immersed stay with modern comforts—perfect for travellers who want the outdoors without sacrificing convenience.

cta.heading: Ready to Book Your Safari Tent?
cta.description: Secure your nature-immersed escape at DEVOCEAN Lodge. Direct booking means the best rates and full support from our team.

comfort.title: Comfort Tent
comfort.shortDescription: Upgraded 12 m² tent with extra privacy (side/back walls), private terrace and your own en-suite bathroom under a thatched roof.
detailedFeatures: Twin/King bed setup • lamps • convenient light switches
Mosquito mesh • strong fan • power points
Private wood terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs
At the back: private bathroom (shower, toilet, sink) under a grass-thatched roof
Village liveliness during peak/holidays; earplugs available

cottage.title: Garden Cottage
cottage.shortDescription: Airy cottage with queen bed, A/C (inverter), desk & dining table, private terrace and bathroom in a charming roundavel.
detailedFeatures: Roman-tiled roof, high white ceiling with dark wood beams
Terracotta floor, warm wheatfields-painted walls
Queen bed • working desk with shaded lamp • dining table with chairs
Suitcase shelves, clothes rack and extra shelving
Inverter A/C (cool & heat) • dimmable main light
Private bath in grass-thatched roundavel (shower, sink, toilet)
Private wooden terrace with camping chairs and side table

chalet.title: Thatched Chalet
chalet.shortDescription: Secluded, romantic tiny chalet under palms and strelitzia. A/C, private bathroom, terrace, Twin/King bed setup.
detailedFeatures: Grass-thatched roof on bluegum poles • autumn-slate floor
Wheatfields-painted walls • tranquil, shaded setting
Dinner table with chairs • air conditioning
Private bathroom (shower, sink, toilet)
Two singles or King with pedestals • private terrace with palm-leaf chairs

safari.title: Safari Tent
safari.shortDescription: 130 sq ft canvas tent on a 10×20 ft platform. Twin/King, fan, power outlets, mosquito mesh, private terrace. Shared bathrooms.
detailedFeatures: Two twin beds (or King) with nightstands and shaded lamps
Mosquito mesh on doors/windows • strong fan • power outlets
Small shelving unit for clothing/essentials
Private terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs facing the tropical garden
Shared bathrooms (ladies/gents): 2 hot/cold showers & 2 toilets each
Village can be lively during holidays; free earplugs at reception

comfort.title: Comfort Tent

detailedFeatures: Twin/King bed setup • lamps • convenient light switches

Private wood terrace with rolled palm-leaf chairs

Village liveliness during peak/holidays; earplugs available

cottage.shortDescription: Airy cottage with queen bed, A/C (inverter), desk & dining table, private terrace and bathroom in a charming roundavel.
detailedFeatures: Roman-tiled roof, high white ceiling with dark wood beams
Terracotta floor, warm wheatfields-painted walls
Queen bed • working desk with shaded lamp • dining table with chairs
Suitcase shelves, clothes rack and extra shelving
Inverter A/C (cool & heat) • dimmable main light
Private bath in grass-thatched roundavel (shower, sink, toilet)
Private wooden terrace with camping chairs and side table

chalet.title: Thatched Chalet
chalet.shortDescription: Secluded, romantic tiny chalet under palms and bird of paradise. A/C, private bathroom, terrace, Twin/King bed setup.
detailedFeatures: Grass-thatched roof on bluegum poles • autumn-slate floor
Wheatfields-painted walls • tranquil, shaded setting
Dinner table with chairs • air conditioning
Private bathroom (shower, sink, toilet)
Two twins or King with nightstands • private terrace with palm-leaf chairs

safari.heroDescription: Ervaar de perfecte balans tussen comfort en avontuur. Geplaatst op een ruim 3×6 m platform, heeft deze 12 m² canvas tent beschermende zij- en achterwanden—die u privacy en beschutting bieden terwijl u dicht bij de natuur blijft.

sections.heading: Ruimte en Indeling
sections.description: De tent beschikt over een goed gepland, gezellig interieur met doordachte details voor gemakkelijk leven.
features: Zij- en achterwand voor privacy en beschutting
Muskietennet op alle ramen en deuren

sections.heading: Slaap en Comfort
sections.description: Twee eenpersoonsbedden met nachtkastjes en schaduwlampen kunnen worden gecombineerd tot een King-size bed voor gasten die de voorkeur geven aan een dubbele configuratie.
features: Stopcontacten voor het opladen van apparaten
Klein rekje voor kleding en essentiële items

sections.heading: Terras en Tuin
sections.description: Stap op uw privéterras, ingericht met opgerolde palmbladstoelen. Geniet van het uitzicht op de weelderige tropische tuin—prachtig verlicht 's nachts voor een romantische ambiance.

sections.heading: Badkamers
sections.description: Gasten hebben toegang tot gedeelde badkamers, gescheiden voor dames en heren—schoon en handig gehouden.

sections.heading: Goed om te Weten
sections.description: Tijdens feestdagen in het weekend en het hoogseizoen (eind december–begin januari) kan het dorp levendig zijn. Gratis oordopjes zijn beschikbaar bij de receptie om een goede nachtrust te garanderen.
sections.closingNote: Een ruim, in de natuur ondergedompeld verblijf met modern comfort—perfect voor reizigers die het buitenleven willen zonder gemak op te offeren.

cta.heading: Klaar om Uw Safaritent te Boeken?
cta.description: Verzeker uw natuurlijke ontsnapping bij DEVOCEAN Lodge. Direct boeken betekent de beste tarieven en volledige ondersteuning van ons team.

comfort.title: Comfort Tent
comfort.shortDescription: Opgewaardeerde 12 m² tent met extra privacy (zij/achterwanden), privé terras en eigen en-suite badkamer onder een rieten dak.
detailedFeatures: Twin/King bed opstelling • lampen • handige lichtschakelaars
Muggennet • sterke ventilator • stopcontacten
Privé houten terras met gerolde palmblad stoelen
Aan de achterkant: privé badkamer (douche, toilet, wastafel) onder een gras rieten dak
Dorp levendigheid tijdens piek/vakanties; oordopjes beschikbaar

cottage.title: Tuin Cottage

detailedFeatures: Romaans tegeldak, hoog wit plafond met donkere houten balken
Terracotta vloer, warm tarwevelden-geschilderde muren
Queen bed • werkbureau met lamp met kap • eettafel met stoelen
Koffer planken, kledingrek en extra planken
Inverter A/C (koel & warmte) • dimbare hoofdlicht
Privé bad in gras rieten roundavel (douche, wastafel, toilet)
Privé houten terras met kampeerstoelen en bijzettafel

chalet.title: Rieten Chalet

Tarwevelden-geschilderde muren • rustige, schaduwrijke setting
Eettafel met stoelen • airconditioning

safari.title: Tente Safari
safari.shortDescription: Tente en toile de 12 m² sur une plateforme de 3×6 m. Twin/King, ventilateur, prises de courant, moustiquaire, terrasse privée. Sanitaires partagés.
detailedFeatures: Deux lits simples (ou King) avec chevets et lampes ombragées
Moustiquaire sur portes/fenêtres • ventilateur puissant • prises de courant
Petite étagère pour vêtements/essentiels
Terrasse privée avec chaises en feuilles de palmier roulées face au jardin tropical
Salles de bains partagées (dames/messieurs): 2 douches chaudes/froides & 2 toilettes chacune
Le village peut être animé pendant les vacances; bouchons d'oreilles gratuits à la réception

comfort.title: Tente Comfort
comfort.shortDescription: Tente améliorée de 12 m² avec confidentialité supplémentaire (murs latéraux/arrière), terrasse privée et salle de bain en-suite sous un toit de chaume.
detailedFeatures: Configuration lit Twin/King • lampes • interrupteurs de lumière pratiques
Moustiquaire • ventilateur puissant • prises de courant

Animation du village pendant les pics/vacances; bouchons d'oreilles disponibles

cottage.title: Cottage de Jardin

Sol en terracotta, murs peints en champs de blé chauds
Lit queen • bureau de travail avec lampe ombragée • table à manger avec chaises
Étagères pour valises, porte-vêtements et étagères supplémentaires
Climatisation inverter (froid & chaleur) • lumière principale dimmable
Salle de bain privée dans roundavel de chaume d'herbe (douche, lavabo, toilette)
Terrasse en bois privée avec chaises de camping et table d'appoint

chalet.title: Chalet de Chaume

Murs peints en champs de blé • cadre tranquille, ombragé

cottage.title: Tuin Cottage
cottage.shortDescription: Lugagtige cottage met queen bed, A/C (omskakelaar), lessenaar & eetafel, private terras en badkamer in 'n bekoorlike roundavel.
detailedFeatures: Romeinse teëldak, hoë wit plafon met donker houtbalke
Terracotta vloer, warm koringvelde-geschilderde mure
Queen bed • werklessenaar met skadulamp • eetafel met stoele
Koffer rakkies, klere rek en ekstra rakkies
Omsakelaar A/C (koel & hitte) • dimbare hooflig
Private bad in grasdak roundavel (stort, wasbak, toilet)
Private hout terras met kamp stoele en sytafel

chalet.title: Grasdak Chalet
chalet.shortDescription: Afgesonderde, romantiese klein chalet onder palmbome en strelitzia. A/C, private badkamer, terras, Twin/King bed opstelling.
detailedFeatures: Grasdak op bluegum pole • herfs lei vloer
Koringvelde-geschilderde mure • rustige, skaduryke omgewing
Eettafel met stoele • lugversorging
Private badkamer (stort, wasbak, toilet)
Twee enkels of King met pedestale • private terras met palmblaar stoele

safari.title: Itende le-Safari
safari.shortDescription: Itende le-canvas ye-12 m² ku-platform ye-3×6 m. Ama-Twin/King, isiphephetho, amaphoyinti kagesi, inetha le-mosquito, ithala langasese. Ama-ablutions abelwe.
detailedFeatures: Amabhedi amabili single (noma i-King) nama-pedestal nama-lamp ashaded
Inetha le-mosquito emasangweni/amafasitela • isiphephetho esiqinile • amaphoyinti kagesi
Iyunithi encane yeshelufu yezingubo/izidingo
Ithala langasese elinezihlalo ze-palm-leaf ezigoqiwe ezibheke ensimini ye-tropical
Izindlu zokugeza ezelwe (amadodakazi/amadoda): 2 ama-shower ashisayo/amabanda & 2 ama-toilet ngamunye
Idolobhana lingaba nemisebenzi ngesikhathi samaholide; ama-earplug mahhala e-reception

comfort.title: Itende le-Comfort
comfort.shortDescription: Itende elithuthukisiwe ye-12 m² eline-privacy eyengeziwe (izindonga ezi-side/back), ithala langasese kanye ne-bathroom yakho en-suite ngaphansi kophahla lwe-thatch.
detailedFeatures: Ukusetha ibhedi ye-Twin/King • ama-lamp • ama-switch elula okukhanya
Inetha le-mosquito • isiphephetho esiqinile • amaphoyinti kagesi
Ithala langokhuni langasese elinezihlalo ze-palm-leaf ezigoqiwe
Ngemuva: bathroom langasese (ishawa, indlu yangasese, isinki) ngaphansi kophahla lwe-grass-thatch
Ukuvuka kwedolobhana ngesikhathi se-peak/holide; ama-earplug atholakala

cottage.title: I-Cottage yensimini
cottage.shortDescription: I-cottage enomoya eline-bhedi ye-queen, i-A/C (inverter), ideski & itafula lokudla, ithala langasese ne-bathroom ku-roundavel e-charming.
detailedFeatures: Uphahla lwe-tiled ye-Roman, uphahla oluphakeme olumhlophe ngama-beam okhuni omnyama
Isitezi se-terracotta, izindonga ezipendwe ngokushisa kwe-wheatfields
Ibhedi ye-Queen • ideski yokusebenza eline-lamp eshaded • itafula lokudla elinezihlalo
Ama-shelufu e-suitcase, irack yezingubo nama-shelufu eyengeziwe
I-A/C inverter (pholile & shisa) • ukukhanya okukhulu okudimmable
I-bath langasese ku-grass-thatch roundavel (ishawa, isinki, indlu yangasese)
Ithala langokhuni langasese elinezihlalo ze-camping ne-tafula eceleni

chalet.title: I-Chalet ye-Thatch
chalet.shortDescription: I-chalet encane ye-romantic ehlukanisiwe ngaphansi kwe-palms ne-strelitzia. I-A/C, bathroom langasese, ithala, ukusetha ibhedi ye-Twin/King.
detailedFeatures: Uphahla lwe-grass-thatch ku-bluegum poles • i-autumn-slate floor
Izindonga ezipendwe ngama-wheatfields • isetingi ethulile, esithunzi
Itafula lokudla elinezihlalo • i-air conditioning
Bathroom langasese (ishawa, isinki, indlu yangasese)
Ama-single amabili noma i-King nama-pedestal • ithala langasese elinezihlalo ze-palm-leaf

safari.title: Hema ya Safari
safari.shortDescription: Hema ya turubai ya 12 m² kwenye platformu ya 3×6 m. Twin/King, feni, pointi za umeme, wavu wa mbu, terrace ya private. Choo za kushiriki.
detailedFeatures: Vitanda viwili single (au King) na pedestals na taa za kivuli
Wavu wa mbu kwenye milango/madirisha • feni yenye nguvu • pointi za umeme
Kitengo kidogo cha rafu kwa nguo/essentials
Terrace ya private na viti vya majani ya palm iliyopindwa inayoelekea kwenye bustani ya tropiki
Choo za kushiriki (wanawake/wanaume): 2 shower za moto/baridi & 2 choo kila moja
Kijiji kinaweza kuwa na shughuli wakati wa likizo; earplug za bure kwenye reception

comfort.title: Hema ya Comfort
comfort.shortDescription: Hema iliyoboreshwa ya 12 m² na privacy ya ziada (kuta za upande/nyuma), terrace ya private na chumba chako cha kuoga en-suite chini ya paa la nyasi.
detailedFeatures: Mpangilio wa kitanda Twin/King • taa • switch za nuru rahisi
Wavu wa mbu • feni yenye nguvu • pointi za umeme
Terrace ya mbao ya private na viti vya majani ya palm iliyopindwa
Nyuma: chumba cha kuoga private (shower, choo, sinki) chini ya paa la nyasi
Shughuli za kijiji wakati wa kilele/likizo; earplug zinapatikana

cottage.title: Cottage ya Bustani
cottage.shortDescription: Cottage yenye hewa na kitanda cha queen, A/C (inverter), desk & meza ya kula, terrace ya private na chumba cha kuoga katika roundavel ya charming.
detailedFeatures: Paa la vigae za Roman, paa refu nyeupe na mihimili ya mbao nyeusi
Sakafu ya terracotta, kuta zilizopakwa rangi ya wheatfields ya joto
Kitanda cha queen • desk ya kufanyia kazi na taa ya kivuli • meza ya kula na viti
Rafu za suitcase, rack ya nguo na rafu za ziada
A/C inverter (baridi & joto) • nuru kuu inayoweza kudhibiti
Chumba cha kuoga private katika grass-thatch roundavel (shower, sinki, choo)
Terrace ya mbao ya private na viti ya camping na meza ya upande

chalet.title: Chalet ya Nyasi
chalet.shortDescription: Chalet ndogo ya romantic iliyotengwa chini ya mitende na strelitzia. A/C, chumba cha kuoga private, terrace, mpangilio wa kitanda Twin/King.
detailedFeatures: Paa ya nyasi ya grass kwenye nguzo za bluegum • sakafu ya slate ya autumn
Kuta zilizopakwa wheatfields • mpangilio tulivu, yenye kivuli
Meza ya kula na viti • air conditioning
Chumba cha kuoga private (shower, sinki, choo)
Vitanda viwili single au King na pedestals • terrace ya private na viti ya majani ya palm

safari.title: サファリテント
safari.shortDescription: 3×6 m プラットフォーム上の12 m² キャンバステント. Twin/King, ファン, 電源ポイント, 蚊帳, プライベートテラス. 共有の洗面所.
detailedFeatures: 2つのシングルベッド (またはKing) と台座付きのシェードランプ
ドア/窓の蚊帳 • 強力ファン • 電源ポイント
服/必需品用の小さな棚ユニット
トロピカルガーデンに向いたロールパームリーフチェア付きプライベートテラス
共有バスルーム (レディース/ジェンツ): それぞれ2つの温/冷シャワー & 2つのトイレ
休暇中に村が賑やかになる可能性; 受付で無料イヤープラグ

comfort.title: コンフォートテント
comfort.shortDescription: 追加プライバシー (サイド/バックウォール) のアップグレードされた12 m² テント, プライベートテラスとサッチ屋根の下の専用バスルーム.
detailedFeatures: Twin/King ベッドセットアップ • ランプ • 便利なライトスイッチ
蚊帳 • 強力ファン • 電源ポイント
ロールパームリーフチェア付きプライベートウッドテラス
後ろ: グラスサッチ屋根の下のプライベートバスルーム (シャワー, トイレ, シンク)
ピーク/休暇中の村の賑やかさ; イヤープラグ利用可能

cottage.title: ガーデンコテージ
cottage.shortDescription: クイーンべッド, A/C (インバーター), デスク & ダイニングテーブル, プライベートテラスと魅力的なランダベル内のバスルーム付きの風通しの良いコテージ.
detailedFeatures: ローマンタイル屋根, 高い白い天井に暗い木の梁
テラコッタフロア, 暖かい小麦畑塗りの壁
クイーンべッド • シェードランプ付きワークデスク • チェア付きダイニングテーブル
スーツケース棚, 服掛けと追加棚
インバーター A/C (クール & ヒート) • 調光可能メインライト
グラスサッチランダベル内のプライベートバス (シャワー, シンク, トイレ)
キャンプチェアとサイドテーブル付きプライベートウッドテラス

chalet.title: サッチシャレ
chalet.shortDescription: パームとストレリチアの下の孤立したロマンチックな小さなシャレ. A/C, プライベートバスルーム, テラス, Twin/King ベッドセットアップ.
detailedFeatures: ブルーガムポール上のグラスサッチ屋根 • 秋のスレートフロア
小麦畑塗りの壁 • 平穏でシェードされた設定
チェア付きディナーテーブル • エアコン
プライベートバスルーム (シャワー, シンク, トイレ)
2つのシングルまたはKingと台座 • パームリーフチェア付きプライベートテラス

safari.title: Safari 帐篷
safari.shortDescription: 3×6 m 平台上的12 m² 帆布帐篷. Twin/King, 风扇, 电源插座, 蚊帐, 私人露台. 共享盥洗室.
detailedFeatures: 两张单人床 (或 King) 带底座和遮光灯
门/窗上的蚊帐 • 强劲风扇 • 电源插座
用于服装/必需品的小型搁架单元
面向热带花园的卷棕榈叶椅私人露台
共享浴室 (女士/先生): 每处2个热水/冷水淋浴 & 2个厕所
假期期间村庄可能热闹; 接待处免费耳塞

comfort.title: 舒适帐篷
comfort.shortDescription: 升级的12 m² 帐篷, 具有额外隐私 (侧/后墙), 私人露台和茅草屋顶下的套间浴室.
detailedFeatures: Twin/King 床配置 • 灯 • 方便灯光开关
蚊帐 • 强劲风扇 • 电源插座
带卷棕榈叶椅的私人木露台
后面: 草茅屋顶下的私人浴室 (淋浴, 马桶, 水槽)
高峰/假期期间村庄热闹; 耳塞可用

cottage.title: 花园小屋
cottage.shortDescription: 通风小屋, 带女王床, A/C (逆变器), 书桌 & 餐桌, 私人露台和迷人圆形亭内的浴室.
detailedFeatures: 罗马瓦屋顶, 高白天花板带深色木梁
赤土地板, 温暖小麦田涂墙
女王床 • 带遮光灯的工作书桌 • 带椅子的餐桌
行李架, 衣架和额外架子
逆变器 A/C (凉 & 热) • 可调光主灯
草茅圆形亭内的私人浴 (淋浴, 水槽, 马桶)
带露营椅和侧桌的私人木露台

chalet.title: 茅草木屋
chalet.shortDescription: 棕榈和鸟之天堂花下的僻静浪漫小木屋. A/C, 私人浴室, 露台, Twin/King 床配置.
detailedFeatures: 蓝胶柱上的草茅屋顶 • 秋季板岩地板
小麦田涂墙 • 平静, 阴凉环境
带椅子的餐桌 • 空调
私人浴室 (淋浴, 水槽, 马桶)
两个单人或 King 带底座 • 带棕榈叶椅的私人露台

safari.title: Палатка Сафари
safari.shortDescription: Палатка из холста 12 м² на платформе 3×6 m. Twin/King, вентилятор, розетки, москитная сетка, частная терраса. Общие санузлы.
detailedFeatures: Две одиночные кровати (или King) с пьедесталами и затененными лампами
Москитная сетка на дверях/окнах • сильный вентилятор • розетки
Маленькая полка для одежды/необходимого
Частная терраса с свернутыми креслами из пальмовых листьев, выходящими на тропический сад
Общие ванные комнаты (женские/мужские): 2 горячих/холодных душа & 2 туалета каждая
Деревня может быть оживленной во время праздников; бесплатные беруши на рецепции

comfort.title: Палатка Комфорт
comfort.shortDescription: Обновленная палатка 12 м² с дополнительной конфиденциальностью (боковые/задние стены), частная терраса и собственная ванная комната под соломенной крышей.
detailedFeatures: Настройка кровати Twin/King • лампы • удобные выключатели света
Москитная сетка • сильный вентилятор • розетки
Частная деревянная терраса с свернутыми креслами из пальмовых листьев
Сзади: частная ванная комната (душ, туалет, раковина) под крышей из травы
Оживленность деревни во время пика/праздников; беруши доступны

cottage.title: Садовый Коттедж
cottage.shortDescription: Воздушный коттедж с кроватью queen, A/C (инвертор), столом & обеденным столом, частной террасой и ванной в очаровательном roundavel.
detailedFeatures: Римская черепичная крыша, высокий белый потолок с темными деревянными балками
Терракотовый пол, теплые окрашенные стены пшеничных полей
Кровать queen • рабочий стол с затененной лампой • обеденный стол с стульями
Полки для чемоданов, вешалка для одежды и дополнительные полки
Инвертор A/C (охлаждение & обогрев) • диммируемый основной свет
Частная ванна в соломенной roundavel (душ, раковина, туалет)
Частная деревянная терраса с кемпинговыми стульями и боковым столом

chalet.title: Соломенный Шале
chalet.shortDescription: Уединенный, романтический маленький шале под пальмами и стрелицией. A/C, частная ванная, терраса, настройка кровати Twin/King.
detailedFeatures: Соломенная крыша из травы на столбах bluegum • осенний сланцевый пол
Окрашенные стены пшеничных полей • спокойная, затененная обстановка
Обеденный стол со стульями • кондиционер
Частная ванная (душ, раковина, туалет)
Две одиночные или King с пьедесталами • частная терраса с креслами из пальмовых листьев

safari.heroDescription: Experimente o equilíbrio perfeito entre conforto e aventura. Situada em uma plataforma espaçosa de 3×6 m, esta tenda de lona de 12 m² tem paredes laterais e traseiras protetoras—oferecendo-lhe privacidade e abrigo enquanto permanece perto da natureza.

sections.heading: Espaço e Layout
sections.description: A tenda apresenta um interior aconchegante e bem planejado com toques cuidadosos para uma vida fácil.
features: Parede lateral e traseira para privacidade e abrigo
Tela mosquiteira em todas as janelas e portas

sections.heading: Sono e Conforto
sections.description: Duas camas de solteiro com criados-mudos e abajures podem ser combinadas em uma cama King-size para hóspedes que preferem uma configuração de casal.
features: Colchões de qualidade e iluminação de cabeceira
Ventilador potente para noites frescas de verão
Pontos de energia para carregar dispositivos
Pequena unidade de prateleiras para roupas e essenciais

sections.heading: Terraço e Jardim
sections.description: Saia para o seu terraço privado, mobiliado com cadeiras de folha de palmeira enrolada. Desfrute de vistas do jardim tropical exuberante—lindamente iluminado à noite para um ambiente romântico.

sections.heading: Banheiros
sections.description: Os hóspedes têm acesso a banheiros compartilhados, separados para senhoras e senhores—mantidos limpos e convenientes.
features: 2× chuveiros de água quente/fria por lado

sections.heading: Bom Saber
sections.description: Durante os fins de semana de feriados públicos e a alta temporada (final de dezembro–início de janeiro), a vila pode estar animada. Protetores auriculares gratuitos estão disponíveis na recepção para garantir uma noite de sono tranquila.
sections.closingNote: Uma estadia espaçosa e imersa na natureza com confortos modernos—perfeita para viajantes que querem o ar livre sem sacrificar a conveniência.

cta.heading: Pronto para Reservar a Sua Tenda Safari?
cta.description: Garanta sua escapada imersa na natureza no DEVOCEAN Lodge. A reserva direta significa as melhores tarifas e apoio total da nossa equipe.

comfort.title: Tenda Comfort
comfort.shortDescription: Tenda atualizada de 12 m² com privacidade extra (paredes laterais/traseiras), terraço privado e banheiro privativo sob um telhado de palha.
detailedFeatures: Configuração de cama Twin/King • lâmpadas • interruptores de luz convenientes
Rede contra mosquitos • ventilador forte • pontos de energia
Terraço de madeira privado com cadeiras de folha de palma enrolada
Nos fundos: banheiro privado (chuveiro, toilete, pia) sob um telhado de grama
Animado na vila durante picos/férias; tampões de ouvido disponíveis

cottage.title: Cottage de Jardim
cottage.shortDescription: Cottage arejado com cama queen, A/C (inversor), mesa de trabalho e mesa de jantar, terraço privado e banheiro em um roundavel charmoso.
detailedFeatures: Telhado de telhas romanas, teto alto branco com vigas de madeira escura
Piso de terracota, paredes pintadas em tons quentes de campos de trigo
Cama queen • mesa de trabalho com lâmpada com abajur • mesa de jantar com cadeiras
Prateleiras para malas, arara para roupas e prateleiras extras
A/C inversor (frio e quente) • luz principal regulável
Banheiro privado em roundavel de grama (chuveiro, pia, toilete)
Terraço de madeira privado com cadeiras de acampamento e mesa lateral

chalet.title: Chalé de Palha
chalet.shortDescription: Chalé pequeno romântico isolado sob palmeiras e strelitzia. A/C, banheiro privado, terraço, configuração de cama Twin/King.
detailedFeatures: Telhado de grama em postes de bluegum • piso de ardósia outonal
Paredes pintadas em campos de trigo • configuração tranquila, sombreada
Mesa de jantar com cadeiras • ar condicionado
Banheiro privado (chuveiro, pia, toilete)
Duas camas de solteiro ou King com pedestais • terraço privado com cadeiras de folha de palma

safari.heroDescription: Experimente o equilíbrio perfeito entre conforto e aventura. Situada numa plataforma espaçosa de 3×6 m, esta tenda de lona de 12 m² tem paredes laterais e traseiras protectoras—oferecendo-lhe privacidade e abrigo enquanto permanece perto da natureza.

sections.heading: Espaço e Disposição
sections.description: A tenda apresenta um interior acolhedor e bem planeado com toques cuidadosos para uma vida fácil.
features: Parede lateral e traseira para privacidade e abrigo
Rede mosquiteira em todas as janelas e portas

sections.heading: Sono e Conforto
sections.description: Duas camas de solteiro com mesinhas-de-cabeceira e candeeiros podem ser combinadas numa cama King-size para hóspedes que preferem uma configuração de casal.
features: Colchões de qualidade e iluminação de cabeceira
Ventoinha potente para noites frescas de Verão
Pequena unidade de prateleiras para roupa e essenciais

sections.heading: Terraço e Jardim
sections.description: Saia para o seu terraço privado, mobilado com cadeiras de folha de palmeira enrolada. Desfrute de vistas do jardim tropical exuberante—lindamente iluminado à noite para um ambiente romântico.

sections.heading: Casas de Banho
sections.description: Os hóspedes têm acesso a casas de banho partilhadas, separadas para senhoras e senhores—mantidas limpas e convenientes.
features: 2× chuveiros de água quente/fria por lado

sections.heading: Bom Saber
sections.description: Durante os fins de semana de feriados públicos e a época alta (final de Dezembro–início de Janeiro), a aldeia pode estar animada. Tampões auriculares gratuitos estão disponíveis na recepção para garantir uma noite de sono descansada.
sections.closingNote: Uma estadia espaçosa e imersa na natureza com confortos modernos—perfeita para viajantes que querem o ar livre sem sacrificar a conveniência.

cta.heading: Pronto para Reservar a Sua Tenda Safari?
cta.description: Garanta a sua escapada imersa na natureza no DEVOCEAN Lodge. A reserva directa significa as melhores tarifas e apoio total da nossa equipa.

comfort.title: Tenda Comfort
comfort.shortDescription: Tenda melhorada de 12 m² com privacidade extra (paredes laterais/traseiras), terraço privado e casa de banho privativa sob um telhado de palha.
detailedFeatures: Configuração de cama Twin/King • candeeiros • interruptores de luz convenientes
Rede mosquiteira • ventoinha potente • tomadas eléctricas
Terraço de madeira privado com cadeiras de folha de palmeira enrolada
Nas traseiras: casa de banho privada (chuveiro, sanita, lavatório) sob um telhado de palha
Animação na aldeia durante pico/feriados; tampões auriculares disponíveis

cottage.title: Cottage de Jardim
cottage.shortDescription: Cottage arejado com cama queen, ar condicionado (inversor), secretária e mesa de jantar, terraço privado e casa de banho num roundavel encantador.
detailedFeatures: Telhado de telha romana, tecto alto branco com vigas de madeira escura
Piso de terracota, paredes pintadas em tons quentes de campos de trigo
Cama queen • secretária de trabalho com candeeiro • mesa de jantar com cadeiras
Prateleiras para malas, cabide para roupa e prateleiras extra
Ar condicionado inversor (frio e quente) • luz principal regulável
Casa de banho privada em roundavel de palha (chuveiro, lavatório, sanita)
Terraço de madeira privado com cadeiras de campismo e mesa lateral

chalet.title: Chalé de Palha
chalet.shortDescription: Pequeno chalé romântico isolado sob palmeiras e estrelícias. Ar condicionado, casa de banho privada, terraço, configuração de cama Twin/King.
detailedFeatures: Telhado de palha em postes de bluegum • piso de ardósia outonal
Paredes pintadas em campos de trigo • ambiente tranquilo e sombreado
Mesa de jantar com cadeiras • ar condicionado
Casa de banho privada (chuveiro, lavatório, sanita)
Duas camas de solteiro ou King com mesas-de-cabeceira • terraço privado com cadeiras de folha de palmeira
